item.description:
We will meet on the Dartmouth Green. I'll bring some picnic blankets, utensils and paper plates. In case of rain, we will re-locate to Kemeny Hall (located 1 block north of the Green on North Main Street, just behind Baker-Berry Library). If you have difficulty finding us or are wondering if we have re-located to Kemeny Hall, you can call my cell phone: 773-330-5652.

Please bring a dish to share and (if at all possible) label the ingredients. This will help us to avoid any discrepancies that may occur as a result of people having different interpretations of which foods are considered to be "vegan" (ex. honey, white sugar).

We welcome vegans, vegetarians and omnivores at our Meetup events. However, because this is a vegan potluck, we ask that any dishes that you bring be vegan (no meat, no dairy, no eggs, no gelatin). If you have any questions about whether a food item satisfies these criteria or if you need suggestions of easy dishes to make/buy, please feel free to contact me: Lauren.A.Thompson@Dartmouth.edu.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll wear something with the word "vegan" or "tofu
item.name: Vegan Potluck
